Paragraph: 34 Some copolymers based on 9,10-arene functionalized anthracene have recently been reported , but the absorption ranges of the polymers are limited to the wavelengths shorter than 700 nm and their PCEs are moderate , 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 9,10-arene functionalized anthracene |
| the polymers |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "9,10-arene functionalized anthracene" and "the polymers". These entities are materials mentioned in the context of copolymers and their absorption ranges and power conversion efficiencies (PCEs).

The only clear "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "9,10-arene functionalized anthracene". The other entity, "the polymers", is mentioned in a general sense and does not refer to a specific material. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
